meanings.definition: The act of cutting or tearing off limbs or other body parts.
meanings.sent1: The movie showed graphic dismemberments that made me cover my eyes.
meanings.sent2: The dismemberments in the horror story were so realistic.
meanings.sent3: The clumsy magician's trick resulted in accidental dismemberments of his own props.
meanings.sent4: The dismemberments of the old building revealed hidden secrets within its walls.
meanings.sent5: The forensic team carefully examined the dismemberments to gather evidence.
